text: Northeim is a district in Lower Saxony, Germany. The district is located in the Weserbergland mountains. The Weser makes the western border of the district. Another river, the Leine, runs through the district from south to north. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Bad Gandersheim #Dassel #Einbeck #Hardegsen #Moringen #Northeim #Uslar #Bodenfelde #Kalefeld #Katlenburg-Lindau #NÃ¶rten-Hardenberg ==References== Category:Districts of Lower Saxony
title: Northeim (district)
